title: Ignota's SCP-5847 Pixel Fanart
content:

++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7039897022480010502?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7038861006944193798?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1 Process Video] | [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sxKLiXHD6TY Interview Video] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5847 SCP-5847]
[[<]]
> **Filename:** 6255loop.mp4, 6255.gif
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7038861006944193798?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1
> **Derivative of:** SCP-6255 by Roundabouts
[[/<]]
-----
I ended up doing 5847 like I said I would! I love how the colors on this one turned out. :,)

Usually, I just end up doing some complementary color palettes because... they're easy and look nice... but there were so many different types of food in this one I just went ahead and made it rainbow. It ended up fitting!

I did a short mini-interview with Tstaffor on youtube for this one. It's linked w/ all the other stuff I normally link on these, haha.

This article is goofy as hell in a good way. I've said it before but sometimes it's fun to just have fun.
 
+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
